title: Implement Secure Login System
description: As a customer, I want to log in securely using the secure login system, so that my banking data remains safe.
attributes_and_rules: Support multi-factor authentication (MFA), session management, password security policies.
acceptance_criteria:
1. Users can log in using MFA.
2. Sessions are managed securely.
3. Password policies enforce strength and rotation rules.
test_cases: Given a registered user, when they log in with valid credentials and complete MFA, then they are granted access.

title: Implement Role-Based Access Control
description: As an administrator, I want to assign access privileges based on user roles, so that information and actions are protected per user type.
attributes_and_rules: Define and enforce role-based access control (RBAC).
acceptance_criteria:
1. Administrators can assign roles to users.
2. Users can only access data and modules appropriate for their roles.
test_cases: Given an administrator, when they assign roles to users, then those users have restricted access based on roles.

title: Create Modern Intuitive Dashboard
description: As a customer, I want to see my account details and balances at a glance, so that I can manage my finances efficiently.
attributes_and_rules: Display account overview and transaction summaries.
acceptance_criteria:
1. Account details and balances are displayed on the dashboard.
2. Transaction summaries are shown at a glance.
test_cases: Given a logged-in customer, when they access the dashboard, then their account details and balances are visible.

title: Display Personalized Product Recommendations
description: As a customer, I want to see personalized banking products and services that match my profile, so that I can explore relevant options.
attributes_and_rules: Show eligible banking products based on customer profile.
acceptance_criteria: 1. Relevant products and services are displayed based on customer eligibility.
test_cases: Given a logged-in customer, when they view the dashboard, then personalized product recommendations are visible.

title: Implement Responsive Layout
description: As a customer, I want the portal to function consistently across all my devices, so that I can access it anywhere.
attributes_and_rules: Ensure consistent portal function on desktop, tablet, and mobile.
acceptance_criteria:
1. Layout adjusts automatically to various screen resolutions.
2. Branding consistency is maintained.
test_cases: Given a user with different devices, when accessing the portal, then the layout adjusts correctly.

title: Optimize Mobile Experience
description: As a customer, I want the portal to be optimized for mobile use, so that I can complete tasks easily on smaller screens.
attributes_and_rules: Mobile use optimization for better user experience.
acceptance_criteria:
1. The portal is easy to use on mobile devices.
2. Tasks can be completed efficiently on smaller screens.
test_cases: Given a mobile user, when accessing the portal, then the user experience is optimized for mobile.

epic_title: Digital Account Opening and Service Requests
title: Enable Online Account Opening
description: As a customer, I want to open new bank accounts online, so that I can start banking services conveniently.
attributes_and_rules: Develop guided workflows for online account opening.
acceptance_criteria:
1. Customers can open new accounts online.
2. The account opening process is streamlined and user-friendly.
test_cases: Given a potential customer, when they apply to open a new account online, then the process is guided and completed successfully.

epic_title: Digital Account Opening and Service Requests
title: Submit Service Modification Requests
description: As a customer, I want to request changes to my existing banking services online, so that I can manage my accounts without visiting a branch.
attributes_and_rules: Allow customers to request service modifications online.
acceptance_criteria:
1. Service modification requests can be submitted online.
2. Requests are processed efficiently through digital workflows.
test_cases: Given a customer with existing services, when they request changes online, then the modifications are processed successfully.

title: Secure Document Upload
description: As a customer, I want to upload verification documents securely, so that my applications can be processed digitally.
attributes_and_rules: Implement secure file uploads for verification documents.
acceptance_criteria:
1. Documents can be uploaded securely.
2. Compliance with data protection standards is ensured.
test_cases: Given a customer needing document verification, when they upload files, then the documents are stored securely and meet compliance standards.

title: Draft-Saving Functionality
description: As a customer, I want to save unfinished applications as drafts, so that I can continue later without losing progress.
attributes_and_rules: Enable saving of incomplete applications as drafts.
acceptance_criteria:
1. Incomplete applications can be saved as drafts.
2. Data integrity is maintained when drafts are resumed.
test_cases: Given a customer with an unfinished application, when they save it as a draft, then the progress is saved and can be resumed later.

epic_title: Notification System and Real-Time Status Updates
title: Implement Status Tracking
description: As a customer, I want to view the status of my requests, so that I can monitor their progress in real time.
attributes_and_rules: Develop notification system for real-time status updates.
acceptance_criteria:
1. Users can track the status of their requests in real time.
2. Notifications are sent for significant status changes.
test_cases: Given a customer with requests, when they check the status online, then the current status is displayed in real time.

epic_title: Notification System and Real-Time Status Updates
title: Enable Email Notifications for Updates
description: As a customer, I want to receive email alerts when my requests are updated or approved, so that I can stay informed.
attributes_and_rules: Provide email notifications for request updates.
acceptance_criteria:
1. Customers receive email alerts for updates.
2. Email notifications are sent automatically for significant status changes.
test_cases: Given a customer with active requests, when status updates occur, then email notifications are sent automatically.

title: Track Customer Interaction History
description: As a customer, I want to see my historical records of services and requests, so that I can track my banking activities.
attributes_and_rules: Store detailed history of all customer actions.
acceptance_criteria:
1. Historical records of services and requests are viewable.
2. Data integrity and security are maintained for stored records.
test_cases: Given a customer, when they view their interaction history, then all past actions and requests are accurately displayed.

title: Maintain System Audit Logs
description: As an administrator, I want to review detailed activity logs, so that I can ensure compliance and trace customer actions if needed.
attributes_and_rules: Generate audit logs for all system activities.
acceptance_criteria:
1. Activity logs can be viewed by administrators.
2. Logs provide detailed information for compliance audits.
test_cases: Given an administrator, when reviewing audit logs, then detailed records of all system activities are available for analysis.

title: Real-Time Core System Synchronization
description: As a customer, I want my portal data to reflect updates from the bankâ€™s core system in real time, so that information stays consistent.
attributes_and_rules: Enable real-time data synchronization with core banking system.
acceptance_criteria:
1. Portal data updates reflect changes in real time from the core system.
2. Information consistency between systems is maintained.
test_cases: Given a customer, when the core system data changes, then the portal data is updated in real time.

title: Secure API Data Exchange
description: As a developer, I want secure APIs connecting the portal to core banking systems, so that requests and transactions are processed efficiently.
attributes_and_rules: Develop secure APIs for data exchange with core systems.
acceptance_criteria:
1. APIs are secure and enable efficient data exchange.
2. Transaction integrity is maintained.
test_cases: Given a developer, when integrating APIs, then data is exchanged securely and transactions are processed efficiently.

title: Setup Independent Portal Database
description: As a system architect, I want a standalone portal database, so that performance remains stable and isolated from core banking operations.
attributes_and_rules: Design a dedicated, scalable portal database.
acceptance_criteria:
1. A standalone portal database is set up.
2. Performance remains stable and isolated from core system.
test_cases: Given a system architect, when setting up the database, then it is dedicated to the portal and performs independently.

title: Optimize Database Performance and Backup
description: As a system administrator, I want optimized database queries and regular backups, so that data retrieval is fast and reliable.
attributes_and_rules: Optimize queries, implement caching, and regular backups.
acceptance_criteria:
1. Database queries are optimized for performance.
2. Regular backups ensure data integrity and recovery.
test_cases: Given a system administrator, when running database queries, then the retrieval is fast and reliable, and backups are regularly performed.

title: Implement End-to-End Encryption
description: As a security officer, I want user data encrypted during transmission and storage, so that sensitive financial information is always protected.
attributes_and_rules: Ensure end-to-end encryption in data exchanges.
acceptance_criteria:
1. Data is encrypted during transmission and storage.
2. Encryption meets regulatory standards.
test_cases: Given a security officer, when data is transmitted or stored, then encryption is always applied and compliant with standards.

title: Generate Compliance Audit Reports
description: As a compliance officer, I want to generate security and data handling audits, so that regulatory standards are consistently maintained.
attributes_and_rules: Maintain security audits and vulnerability tests.
acceptance_criteria:
1. Security and data handling audits can be generated.
2. Vulnerability testing is conducted regularly.
test_cases: Given a compliance officer, when generating audit reports, then regulatory standards adherence is verified.
